text: Does anyone know of keyboard button emoticons? I want to replace actual spaces with a spacebar emoji in order to pass some parsing rules, and then replace it with spaces again afterwards. Alternatively, does anyone know of some other dope-looking space-ish emojis?

elements.text: Does anyone know of keyboard button emoticons? I want to replace actual spaces with a spacebar emoji in order to pass some parsing rules, and then replace it with spaces again afterwards. Alternatively, does anyone know of some other dope-looking space-ish emojis?

text: There's a range of substitute characters in common use, like	␠␣ <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Whitespace_character?wprov=sfla1|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Whitespace_character?wprov=sfla1>

attachments.title: Whitespace character
attachments.text: In computer programming, whitespace is any character or series of characters that represent horizontal or vertical space in typography. When rendered, a whitespace character does not correspond to a visible mark, but typically does occupy an area on a page. For example, the common whitespace symbol U+0020   SPACE (also ASCII 32) represents a blank space punctuation character in text, used as a word divider in Western scripts.

elements.text: There's a range of substitute characters in common use, like	␠␣
